snippet: Indianapolis, an overhauled team that came together even in the absence of Coach Chuck Pagano, faces Baltimore in an A.F.C. wild-card game Sunday.
abstract: Indianapolis Colts, overhauled team that has come together even in the absence of coach Chuck Pagano, is preparing to face Baltimore Ravens in upcoming AFC wild-card game; Pagano has been coaching in absentia ever since his treatment for leukemia began in the fourth week of the 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: Indianapolis, an overhauled team that came together even in the absence of Coach Chuck Pagano, faces Baltimore in an A.F.C. wild-card game Sunday.

headline.seo: In Emotional Season, the Colts Never Broke
headline.main: In an Emotional, Rebuilding Season, the Colts Never Broke
headline.print_headline: In an Emotional, Rebuilding Season, the Colts Never Broke
